	Problem Solving: Handling customer&rsquo;s complaints and issues with professionalism, seeking to resolve them effectively.
	Training and Development: Stay updated on menu changes, new promotions, and company policies.
	Its a 24hrs restaurant that runs morning, afternoon and night shifts.

	Available to resume immediately.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 0-5 years of experience.

N40,000 - N60,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;

  "description": "Chilis Restaurant is a 24hrs restaurant that runs morning, afternoon and night shifts.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ring Road Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Ensuring food safety: Monitoring food handling, storage, and preparation to prevent contamination and foodborne illness.
	Maintaining consistency: Verifying that dishes are prepared according to recipes and preparation standards
	Ingredient inspection: Checking the quality and freshness of ingredients received from suppliers
	Quality control ensure monitoring raw materials usage, ensure wastage are also controlled
	Cleaning and sanitation: overseeing the cleanliness of the kitchen, equipment and dining areas. Maintain a clean, organized, and safe working environment.
	Environment Hygiene: Quality control/ supervisor ensure environment is in good condition, everywhere must be neat and ensure all utensils were clean also ensure daily cleaning must be done.
	Employee Training: Educating staff on quality of products from suppliers and recommending changes if necessary. Implement quality control procedure
	Menu development: Collaborating with chefs and management to develop new menu items and improve existing ones.
	Performance monitoring and reporting
	Customer feedback: Reviewing customer comments and complaints to identify areas for improvement.
	Compliance: Ensuring the restaurant meets food safety regulations and industry standards.
	Assistance: You are to assist the cashier by working as a cashier to satisfy customer&rsquo;s needs.
	Its a 24hrs restuarant
	Avaialble to resume immediately
